translation.en: OH: Today is best day ever.
Moving Day!
For who? Answer: The Boov.
Who are the Boov?
Answer: Best species ever at running away.
FEMALE ANNOUNCER ON SPEAKERS: All Boov settlers, please report to your assigned transport.
You are allowed one carry-on.
Excusing me. Sorries.
Excusing me. Pardon the me, friend.
Boov do not friend.
Owpain! Uh-oh. Sorries.
Who am I? I am Oh.
translation.ko: 난 누구? '오'라고 해 많은 친구가 지어준 이름이다요

translation.en: I has been given this name by my many, many friends.
Good morning! Oh.
Hi, guys. BOTH: Oh.
Hello. ALL: Oh.
I am very excitement to make a new fresh start!
translation.ko: 난 새 출발할 땐 완전 신남이야

translation.en: We are all moving to best planet ever for to hiding.
translation.ko: 우린 숨기 조은 별로 도망가는 거야

translation.en: Our new home!
(GASPS) Captain Smek!
My fellow Boov! I has saved us again.
translation.ko: 나의 종족 부브! 이번에도 내가 우릴 구했도다

translation.en: Ow! A bit lower.
No, stop!
Up a bit. Up a bit. Perfect. Walk away. Walk away.
translation.ko: 쫌 더 위로! 좋아! 저리 가!

translation.en: My fellow--
My...
fellow...
Boov.
Good news! (GASPS)
Thanks to my leadership skills...
cowering, running and pulling a skedaddle... we are safe from our enemy... the Gorg.
translation.ko: 도망만 다니던 우리가 고그의 위협에서 벗어났다

translation.en: Ooh. Nasty.
Give Daddy some sugar!
translation.ko: '오빠 만세' 외쳐 캡틴 스멕이 우릴 또 구했어

translation.en: Captain Smek has saved us again!
We are now arrived at the best hiding place yet in the Milky Way.
translation.ko: 우린 은하계에서 가장 숨기 좋은 곳에 왔어

translation.en: And the Gorg are lactose intolerant. (LAUGHS) Genius!
They will never find us here.
ALL: Yay! Thank you!
Best of yet... this planet is full of great stuff.
translation.ko: 보나마나 이 별에는 굉장한 게 참 많아

translation.en: Look at these delicious fruits!
That makes me feel so good.
What fun at a party!
Boov do not party.
Also, this planet is inhabited.
But do not worry. The native savages are simple and backwards.
Oh! They are so ugly, they are cute!
Everything you need to know about them can be found... in these comprehensive pamphlets.
translation.ko: 그들에 관한 정보는 이 팜플렛에 상세히 나와

translation.en: INFORMATION BOOV: Comprehensive pamphlet. Comprehensive pamphlet.
They are lucky the Boov have come.
translation.ko: 부브가 온 건 인간에겐 큰 행운이야

translation.en: CAPTAIN SMEK: All right, Boov. Invade on three. One, two, three.
translation.ko: 좋다, 셋에 침략한다 하나, 둘, 셋

translation.en: Rejoice, humanspeople! The Boov are arrived!
Now we are turning off your gravity temporarily...
so as to make your mandatory relocation easier. And more fun! Huh?
translation.ko: 강제 이주가 더 쉽고 더 재미있게 해주겠다

translation.en: So, what is up? You are! (LAUGHS)
Ha! You'll never catch me!
CAPTAIN SMEK: Enjoy you the frozen, sweetened bovine secretion... as we take this short flight to Happy Humanstown.
This is so cool! Come on!
translation.ko: 짱 멋져 - 어서 와! - 어서 와서 타

translation.en: OH: Fa-da! Humanspersons are happiness and joy forever in Happy Humanstown.
translation.ko: 인간사람들은 여기서 행복과 기쁨을 맛볼 거야

translation.en: Welcome to your new home.
Wait, what? No! New home?
OH: And rest of planet is for Boov. Win-win!
Welcome, Boov settlers. All humans have been relocated.
translation.ko: 환영한다, 부브 이주민들! 인간들의 이주가 끝났다

translation.en: Your homes are now ready.
Thanking you!
This planet may be a bit of a fixing-it-upper... but that is okay.
translation.ko: 손볼 데가 좀 있는 별이지만 그런 건 문제없어

translation.en: Boov are best at deciding what is useful.
translation.ko: 우린 쓸모 있는 것과 쓸모 없는 걸

translation.en: And what is not.
Ooh! BOOV: Owpain.
Step aside. Clean-up crew.
ELECTRONIC VOICE: Useless.
OH: Today, I starts a new life.
With new friends. In a new home.
translation.ko: 새 친구와 새 집이 생기는 날

translation.en: ANNOUNCER ON SPEAKERS: Residents may now enter sector 179.
That is me!
OH: And that is why today is best day ever!
translation.ko: 그래서 오늘은 내 생애 쵝오 날이다요

translation.en: Welcome home, neighbors!
Boov do not have "neighbors."
Oh, that is owing to the size and topography of our former planet.
translation.ko: 옛 별에선 지형 때문에 없었던 거야

translation.en: Hey! Can I borrowing a cup of sugar? (ECHOING)
(SHOUTING) What?
But now, our closer proximity can leads to friendship.
translation.ko: 이젠 가까이 살아서 금방 친해질 거야

translation.en: You are all invited... to my warming of house party.
Sure.
Yes!
LUCY: Hey, Pig! Be careful up there!
TIP: I'm sorry, Pig. Mom's not here.
It's just a video.
TIP: Hey, Mom. I think Pig wants to join us. (LAUGHS)
translation.ko: 엄마, 피그도 같이 놀고 싶은가 봐

translation.en: LUCY: It's not funny!
(TIP LAUGHING) Come on, Mom. It's just snow.
LUCY: I don't know anything about snow. Oh!
We're from Barbados! We don't have snow!
Are you okay?
TIP: I'm sending this to everyone.
FEMALE ANNOUNCER ON SPEAKERS: Sector 195 is ready for occupation.
We can't wait for Mom, Pig. We gotta go. Right now!
Oh, no!
FEMALE VOICE: Prepare for your dance attack!
Okay, let's go find Mom.
OH: Neighbors, hello!
Please come in and--
Hello.
Hello?
And right. And left. Other left.
Kyle!
KYLE: Right. No, left.
Hello, friend Kyle.
Oh! I am not your friend.
Of course you are.
translation.ko: 아니긴 우린 재미난 얘기 많이 했는걸

translation.en: We have had many enjoyable talks.
translation.ko: 아니긴 우린 재미난 얘기 많이 했는걸 그건 내가 움직이지 못해서 그래

translation.en: No, we talk only because I'm not allowed to move.
(CHUCKLES) You are always saying the funny things.
translation.ko: 넌 재미난 얘기를 언제나 잘 하잖아

translation.en: Perhaps you can say them at my warming of house party tonight.
I will not. Parties are useless and take up valuable Boov time.
Since you are at your busyness, I shall send an e-vite to you...
translation.ko: 지금 바쁜 거 같으니까 초대장 보낼게

translation.en: so you can join later during your leisure minute.
Please do not send. I enjoy my leisure minute.
translation.ko: 초대장 보내지 마 나 혼자서 즐길래

translation.en: Fa-da! I have sent directions to my living space.
Oh... Fa-da! I have sent directions to my living space.
(GASPS) You sent directions to everyone?
translation.ko: 모두에게 다 보낸 거야? 뭐야? 내 잘못 아냐

translation.en: What? Um, it is not my fault.
Why for put "send" button right next to "send all"?
This is just bad design.
Your invite has been sent to entire galaxy!
Uh-oh. "Uh-oh" is right!
Our enemy, the Gorg, will receive it...
and can use directions for to find us!
ALL: The Gorg?
OH: Fa-da!
You have doomed our species!
translation.ko: 넌 우리 종족에게 큰 재앙을 안겼어

translation.en: OH: No, please. I did not mean to. I am sorries!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 제발! 의도한 건 아냐, 미안하다요!

translation.en: You are arresting!
No! I was just trying to invite you to my--
translation.ko: 안 돼 난 그냥 파티에 초대...

translation.en: KYLE: Security has been compromised. Arrest that Boov!
translation.ko: 시스템 보안망이 뚫렸다 저 놈을 체포하라

translation.en: Autopilot, I needs help!
AUTOPILOT: Help is available in Paris at Boov Headquarters.
translation.ko: 도움은 파리에 있는 부브 본부에 요청해

translation.en: No, Autopilot! Any place but Paris!
You must takes me to a place with no Boovs.
translation.ko: 부브가 없는 곳에 데려다줘 부브가 없는 덴 남극 밖에 없어

translation.en: AUTOPILOT: The only remaining spot on planet with no Boov is Antarctica.
translation.ko: 부브가 없는 덴 남극 밖에 없어

translation.en: Group hug! Oh!
Yes! Antarctica is perfect! Take me there now!
AUTOPILOT: I am sorry. You are fugitive Boov. Initiating Self-Destruct.
No! Do not initiate!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 누르지 마, 난 도망자 아냐

translation.en: No!
Oh, no.
Gotcha, gotcha, gotcha!
What for are you did this?
I am Boov, beloved by all humans.
translation.ko: 난 모든 인간에게 사랑 받는 부브야

translation.en: I know what you are.
Excellent! Can I come into the out now?
translation.ko: 역시, 그럼 내가 그 밖으로 나가도 돼?

translation.en: No, you cannot "come into the out" now.
You can never come into the out, ever again!
But I can! You are just having to take away the piece of wood.
translation.ko: 못 나가긴! 네가 막대기만 치우면 된다요

translation.en: Then I will have to-- I will shoot forth the lasers from my eyeballs!
translation.ko: 안 치우겠다면 내 눈으로 레이저 쏠 거야

translation.en: You can do that?
Yes.
If you shoot your eye lasers, then I'll have no choice...
translation.ko: 레이저 쏜다면 내 선택은 딱 하나지

translation.en: but to explode your head!
You humans cannot to explode--
We can too! We just don't much.
translation.ko: 우리도 할 줄 알아, 안 할 뿐이지

translation.en: It's considered rude.
Then I am granting you a truce.
You are not to exploding heads...
translation.ko: 너는 내 머리 폭파 안 하고

translation.en: and I will not do my devastating eye lasers.
translation.ko: 난 파괴력 큰 레이저를 쏘지 않을게

translation.en: Okay. Truce.
So, can I come into the out now?
No!
translation.ko: - 그 밖으로 나가도 돼? - 아니! 지구를 훔치고 인간을 납치한 벌이야

translation.en: This is what you get for stealing planets and abducting people.
Oh, you are thinking a mistake.
Boov do not steal and abduct.
translation.ko: 부브는 훔치지 않아, 납치도 안 해

translation.en: No, Boov liberate and befriend.
Guess who made this one!
This is so beautiful!
Mom! What's happening? (MEOWING)
I don't know, honey.
Tip! It will be okay.
ELECTRONIC VOICE: Lifeform detected. Not human. Move along.
translation.ko: 생명체 발견, 인간 아님! 계속 전진!

translation.en: CAPTAIN SMEK: Enjoy you the frozen, sweetened bovine secretion...
as we take this short flight to Happy Humanstown.
Mom!
It's all your fault. You stole my mom!
Smell ya later, Boov.
Wait! Smell me now!
I can to fixing your car. I seen you has broken it.
translation.ko: 지금 봐, 가지마! 차 고쳐줄게 고장 낸 거 봤다요

translation.en: I didn't break it. I'm a very good driver.
translation.ko: 고장 안 냈어 난 운전을 아주 잘해

translation.en: It's supposed to leak like that.
Can I come into the out now?
I know the fugitive Boov has made yet another in a series of horrible...
yet unintentionally humorous mistakes.
But let me reassure you, the signal he broadcast... is being handled.
We are definitely not doomed.
And we're out.
We are doomed!
translation.ko: - 촬영 끝! - 우린 끝났다고! 고그 종족이 우릴 찾아낼 거야

translation.en: The Gorg are going to find us again!
The maniac Boov has ruined everything.
This is bad.
And I really love this planet.
Look at all the great stuff they've got.
Like this! A headband!
And for evening wear, you slide it down...
you got a beautiful spare tire.
I love it! Ooh! Very nice!
Who would wanna leave this behind? I have got to fix this.
translation.ko: 누가 여길 떠나고 싶겠어? 내가 해결해야 해

translation.en: (GASPS) I know! Summon the Big Brain Boovs.
The smarty-pants of all smarty panty Booviness.
translation.ko: 모든 천재 가운데 가장 뛰어난 천재

translation.en: Gentleboov... I want ideas.
We could create an alternate reality with no Gorg in it... then go live there.
translation.ko: 고그 없는 대체현실을 만들어서 들어가 사는 거예요

translation.en: Yes! I love it! How long would that take?
Oh, based on our current technology...
1.7 million years.
That's a lot of years, Toni. Moving on!
We could lay on the ground... Yes!
and make the Gorg think we are dead.
translation.ko: 죽은 척 해서 고그를 속이는 거예요

translation.en: Next! MALE BOOV: Ooh, ooh, ooh!
What if we logged into the fugitive Boov's email...
and cancelled his e-vite--
translation.ko: 오의 이메일에 들어가서 초대장을 삭제하면... 시끄! '오의 이메일에 들어가서'

translation.en: Shush! Or we could log into the fugitive Boov's email...
and cancel his invitation, and...
What was that? So the Gorg never receive it.
translation.ko: - 그 다음엔 뭐? - 고그가 절대 못 받습니다

translation.en: So the Gorg never receive it!
Now, type in the password and cancel that message.
It was a good idea of me to make all passwords "password."
It's so easy to remember.
(ALL GASP) It did not work! His password is unique.
(ALL GASPING) No!
Unique? Boov are not unique!
Fetch me my inhaler.
Boy, that works.
His mistaking is leading the Gorg right to us. Show me his invite.
translation.ko: 오의 실수가 고그를 불러들였어 초대장 보여줘

translation.en: You are all invited to a party!
Just head to the Milky Way. Turn right at the Big Dipper.
Third planet from the Sun. Look for my balloons! Party!
translation.ko: 태양에서 세 번째 별이야 파티 풍선을 찾아

translation.en: Come if you like to have fun!
My best friend Kyle will be there!
Kyle, Kyle, Kyle!
Come party!
Kyle!
He is not my friend.
The internet does not lie!
You know him, you can find him. I am putting you in charge!
translation.ko: 넌 놈을 아니까 찾아내 너에게 맡긴다

translation.en: But, Captain, it is not my job. I am only a mid-level traffic Boov.
I admire your cowardice, Officer. Thank you.
But I want every Boovcop on Planet Smekland searching this city.
We need his password... or we will all be destroyed by the Gorg!
translation.ko: 비밀번호 못 알아내면 우린 다 죽어

translation.en: Find him!
That Boov has made his final mistake.
Fa-da!
Oh! You were supposed to fix it! What is this?
I calls it "Slushious."
"Slushious"?
It makes excellent fuel... and comes in fun-to-say flavors.
"Grape Escape." "Tangerine Twist."
"Busta Lime"! (LAUGHS)
Mom's gonna kill me.
Now I am prepared to accept one of your traditional gestures of human gratitude.
translation.ko: 고맙다는 표현을 인간 방식으로 해줘 봐

translation.en: Actually, our tradition is to punch you in the nose. Hold still.
translation.ko: 우리 방식은 코를 한 방 먹이는 거야

translation.en: No! Your gratitude is implied.
OH: You can drives first.
Then I can-- Oh. (HANDLE RATTLES) TIP: You're not coming.
I'm trying to hide from the Boov. I'm not bringing one with me.
translation.ko: 혹을 떼려다가 새 혹을 달 수도 있어

translation.en: You'll just turn me in. No! I just needs a ride!
translation.ko: - 넌 나를 신고할 거잖아 - 안 돼, 차에 태워줘

translation.en: I haves official Boov business out of in town.
translation.ko: 난 부브랑 담판 지을 일이 있어

translation.en: Me, too.
(YELPS) But I fixes your car!
So? I let you out of the freezer. We're even.
translation.ko: 냉장고에서 널 꺼내줬잖아! 우린 비긴 거야

translation.en: What did you do to my car? What doos you mean? It should to hover much better now.
translation.ko: - 내 차를 어떻게 했지? - 무슨 뜻이야? 더 잘 뜰 거야

translation.en: It's a car. It didn't hover at all before.
translation.ko: 이건 차라구! 공중에 뜬 적 없어

translation.en: How do you stop this thing?
Oops. I have apparently reversing the proceed and anti-proceed controls.
Yeah, I noticed. Stop is go.
Go is stop. Wait!
Whyfor you do this? Boovs and humans are friends!
We're not friends. You kidnapped my mom!
Who is Mimom?
No, "my" mom!
What did I say? (GROANS)
I knows how to find her. How?
That information is at Boov Central Command.
translation.ko: 중앙본부 '위대한 안테나'에 가면 알 수 있어

translation.en: At the Great Antenna. What?
translation.ko: 중앙본부 '위대한 안테나'에 가면 알 수 있어 - 뭐라고? - 프랑스 파리! 차에 태워줘!

translation.en: In Paris! Now let me to inside!
Paris. Hmm.
Then promise. What?
Promise you'll help me find her or I'm leaving your Boov butt.
translation.ko: 엄마를 찾아준다고 아님 두고 갈 거야

translation.en: I promise! But if you do not wish to be capturing, it must be now!
Fine. Get in.
Oui, oui, Pig! Paris, here we come. (GROANS)
We're gonna find out where they put Mom.
translation.ko: 엄마 숨긴 곳을 꼭 찾아낼 거야

translation.en: Okay. I shall set the GPS to take us straight to the Paris.
ELECTRONIC VOICE: Destination entered: Antarctica.
Hey, what are you doing?
Oh, how did that happen?
Keep your Boov paws off my car!
translation.ko: 너의 그 발, 내 차에서 치워줘

translation.en: (GASPS) Your vehicle is infested.
(LAUGHS) It's not infested. He's my pet.
His name is Pig. Don't touch him.
Now he is vibrating. (GASPS) Is he going to explode?
No! He's just purring.
Why do you haves this thing? Is it useful? Does it give meat or milk?
translation.ko: 왜 갖고 다녀? 쓸모 있어? 고기나 우유를 줘?

translation.en: What? Ew! No!
You just have pets for fun and companionship.
You has me for companion on the ship.
Yeah, well, Pig is better.
If cat is "Pig," what is your name?
Gratuity Tucci. But my friends call me "Tip."
Tip. I said "my friends."
But we are friends. All humans and Boov.
Captain Smek has decided. Captain Smek is an idiot.
translation.ko: - 캡틴 스멕이 그렇게 결정했어 - 캡틴 스멕은 멍청이야

translation.en: (GASPS) Untrue! Captain Smek is genius and best at running away.
Have you not heard the legend of the Shusher?
Long ago, our enemy, the Gorg... invited the Boov to a peace meeting.
translation.ko: 오래 전 고그가 평화회담에 부브를 초청했었어

translation.en: OH: But Smek wisely fled in terror.
And he took a great trophy: the Shusher.
translation.ko: 폼 나는 트로피도 받았어 그게 시끄봉이야

translation.en: Run away!
TIP: Why is it called the "Shusher"?
Shush!
Mmm. Whatever.
Aw! Seriously? You guys had to ruin the Statue Of Liberty?
"Statue of Smek." You will not get away with this.
(YELPS) Boov Patrol! They are looking for you! TIP: Oh, no.
(SCREAMS)
Oh, no!
What's that?
Hey! Don't distract the driver!
A-ha! Busta Lime.
"Busta Lime."
Owpain! (SHUSHING)
(WHISPERS) Owpain.
Okay. Pee break.
I, too, has to break pee.
Or, as you calls it, the "number one."
We also has the "number two." Okay.
And the "number three." Okay!
translation.ko: - '3번'도 해 - 됐거든요! 다행히 '3번'이 아냐 그럼 위험했을 거야

translation.en: It is a good thing I doos not have to go the number three. It would not be safe for you.
We only doos it once a year.
I would not call it a holiday... but you doos need to take the day off.
translation.ko: 근데 그게 얼마나 요란한지 연차휴가 내야 해

translation.en: That's enough!
Whoa! You can't come in here. This is the girls' room.
Do not eat the blue mints!
Thankfully, there is a large bowl of lemonade.
Do not drink the lemonade!
TIP: Be out in a second.
We're going to Paris! (GRUNTING)
Going to see my mom!
Takes your time!
Ant-arc-tica.
Here I come!
Fugitive Boov. (GASPING)
Hold still for arresting!
Best friend Kyle!
I am not your friend! But I will be a hero Boov for getting your password.
translation.ko: 친구 아냐 비밀번호 알아내서 영웅 될 거야

translation.en: (GASPS) Yes! You has in nick-time saved us!
What is the purpose of your face?
Owpain. You were gonna ditch me?
No! Liar!
I never lie! Yes, you do! And you know how I know?
translation.ko: - 절대 거짓말 안 해 - 하잖아! 어떻게 아냐고?

translation.en: Because every time you lie, you turn green!
I doos not. I--
Poomp.
Open the door, you lying, frog-faced squishy toy!
translation.ko: 열어 이 뻥쟁아! 개구리 같이 생긴 주제에

translation.en: Stop! I need your--
You promised to help me find my mom! Then I un-promise!
translation.ko: - 엄마를 찾아준다고 약속했잖아! - 그 약속 뒤집을래

translation.en: That's not how it works! (GRUNTS)
You have to help me get to Paris.
translation.ko: 파리에 갈 수 있게 날 도와줘야 해

translation.en: I will not!
Stop! I need your--
I must hide! I am speaking the English at you. Why for you do not understands me?
translation.ko: 난 숨어야 해, 지구말 하는데 왜 못 이해한다요?

translation.en: Oh, I "understands." I just don't care.
Freezing! Look out!
Oh, come on!
KYLE: Stop! I need your (IN SLOW-MOTION) password.
No! Go!
All I wanted was his password.
This is not a sustainable friendship model.
translation.ko: 자꾸 이럼 우리 우정 롱런 못 해

translation.en: CAPTAIN SMEK: So...
I assume by now we have apprehended the fugitive.
Anybody? Um... You. The purple one.
Not that purple. The other purple. The other purple.
translation.ko: 이 보라 말고! 박 보라, 김 보라, 신 보라

translation.en: That one.
Yes, you! Oh!
So, where is he?
We do not know, sir.
What? This is number one disaster! His message must not reach the Gorg.
translation.ko: 뭐? 특급 재앙이다 초대장이 도착하면 안돼

translation.en: This planet was hard to find, and I will not abandon it!
translation.ko: 어떻게 찾은 별인데 난 포기 못 해

translation.en: Someone fetch me my stress blankie.
So soothing.
A-ha! Officer Kyle! Now here is a Boov who knows how to do his job.
translation.ko: 아하, 카일 경관! 일 잘하는 부브가 왔군

translation.en: Tell me, you have found the fugitive?
Yes.
Joyful exclamation!
And where is he?
Well, uh... There is a tiny problem.
"Tiny." As long as it's tiny, who cares?
translation.ko: 작은 문제면 신경 안 써도 되겠네

translation.en: Well, before I got the password...
I erased him. (SMACKING LIPS)
OH: Come party. Come party. Come party.
Ow! Quit it! Sorry.
Look, Paris is danger for both of us. It crawls with Boov.
Doos you have a plan for once we are get there? Hmm?
Not really. But I have hope.
translation.ko: 꼭 그렇진 않아 그치만 희망은 있어

translation.en: Oh! You are bad at math.
Excuse me? I got an "A" in geometry.
I am only saying...
translation.ko: 내 말은... 이 방면에선 부브가 우월하단 뜻이야

translation.en: Boov are superior in this way.
translation.ko: 내 말은... 이 방면에선 부브가 우월하단 뜻이야 성공할 확률이 50퍼센트 이하면

translation.en: If probability for success falls below 50%... (SIGHS)
Boov give up. You do not.
Exactly! Enough with the ripping!
Okay, okay. Tell you what. Let's have some tuneage.
What is that?
Boov song.
translation.ko: - 이게 뭐야? - '부브 송'! 곡명은 '무조건 복종'이야 완전 히트 쳤어

translation.en: It is called "Motionless and Obedient." Very big hit.
No, no, no! Not in my car. Driver gets to pick.
translation.ko: 아니, 아니! 내 차에선 안돼 선곡은 운전자 마음이야

translation.en: This is not even music. This is just noise.
translation.ko: 이건 음악도 아냐 딱 보니 소음이네

translation.en: Involuntary physical response.
You have tricked me into listening to a debilitating sonic weapon.
translation.ko: 요상한 곡에 홀리게끔 네가 속임수 썼잖아

translation.en: If you want humans to not hate you...
you could start by liking some of our stuff.
Confusion. What is happening to my body?
It's called dancing!
Boov do not dancing!
I can tell. But you're getting the hang of it!
How long before this kills me?
I am not in control of my own extremities!
translation.ko: 내 손발을 내 맘대로 할 수가 없어

translation.en: That's it. Work it! I do not want it to work!
Hey, you know what? "Boov" rhymes with "groove."
Shake your Boov thang.
(GASPS) It is shaking in a most undignified way!
translation.ko: 내 엉덩이가 너무 매너 없이 돌아가

translation.en: Oh, no! My hands are in the air
translation.ko: 미쳐, 내 손이 제멋대로 뱅뱅 돌아

translation.en: like I just do not care!
translation.ko: 미쳐, 내 손이 제멋대로 뱅뱅 돌아 부브는 이러지 않아 쥐구멍 찾고 싶어

translation.en: This is not how a Boov behaves! I am overheated with shame!
translation.ko: 부브는 이러지 않아 쥐구멍 찾고 싶어

translation.en: I must cool my core! Wait! What are you doing?
translation.ko: - 체온 식혀야 해 - 잠깐만! 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: I will returning!
We were having fun!
Oh!
Oh?
(LAUGHING) TIP: Come on, Mom. It's just snow!
LUCY: I don't know anything about snow. Oh!
Our first snow!
LUCY: Are you okay?
TIP: I'm sending this to--
My temperature is back to happiness.
translation.ko: 기분 딱 좋게 체온이 돌아왔어 미운 마음 없다는 걸 보여주려고

translation.en: And to show I do not hold against you any grudge-ment...
I have brought you delicious snacking.
Fa-da! Chewy plastic rings!
I really do not enjoy your human gratitude customs.
Where have you been? You were gone forever!
translation.ko: 어디 갔었어? 영영 떠난 줄 알았어

translation.en: That is not accurate. "Forever" is--
I thought you were dead! Or hurt!
Or I don't know!
translation.ko: 아니면, 글쎄! 혼자 두고 가는 게 어디 있어? 너도 내 신발을 신어봐

translation.en: But you cannot just leave someone alone like that!
translation.ko: 혼자 두고 가는 게 어디 있어? 너도 내 신발을 신어봐

translation.en: Put yourself in my shoes!
translation.ko: 혼자 두고 가는 게 어디 있어? 너도 내 신발을 신어봐 네 신발을 어떻게? 내 발들은 아주 작아

translation.en: How could I wears your shoes? My pods are too small.
translation.ko: 네 신발을 어떻게? 내 발들은 아주 작아

translation.en: It's an expression!
translation.ko: 속뜻이 있는 표현이야 남의 입장에서 생각해 보란 뜻이야

translation.en: It means try to feel how someone else feels.
translation.ko: 남의 입장에서 생각해 보란 뜻이야 나 같은 아이는 계속 혼자 두면 안 돼

translation.en: (SIGHS) I'm just a kid.
translation.ko: 나 같은 아이는 계속 혼자 두면 안 돼

translation.en: I'm not supposed to be by myself all the time.
translation.ko: 나 같은 아이는 계속 혼자 두면 안 돼 아이를 위험에 놔두면 그것도 범죄야

translation.en: This is child endangerment. Which is a crime, by the way.
But when I founded you, you were already alone... so I thinks it is normal for you.
translation.ko: 첨 발견했을 때 넌 혼자였잖아 그게 정상인줄 알았다요

translation.en: When Boov are young, we are kept in the warming oven.
Is this normal for humanspersons?
Well, usually, we don't cross the Atlantic by ourselves until we're 16.
No, none of this is normal!
Don't you get it? You ruined everything!
I was finally happy here-- there, where I lived.
With my mom.
translation.ko: 엄마랑 함께! 적응하는 게 얼마만큼 힘들었는지 알아?

translation.en: Do you know how hard it was for me to fit in?
How long that took? 7th-grade girls are mean!
translation.ko: 얼마나 오래 걸렸는지? 중1 여자애들은 못됐어

translation.en: Yes, I sees that! I did not realize!
We will resume the finding of Mimom.
(GROANS) Stop saying that! She's just "my" mom.
Not yours. Mine. How do you not understand this?
translation.ko: 네 엄마가 아니고 내 엄마야 그것도 구별 못해?

translation.en: How would you feel if some horrible aliens took your mother from you?
translation.ko: 무서운 외계인이 네 엄마를 뺏으면 어떻겠어?

translation.en: That could not to happen. Boov are not having mimoms.
translation.ko: 그럴 일 안 생겨 부브는 '울 엄마'가 없다요

translation.en: Boov don't have families.
No wonder you take things and don't care about anybody else.
translation.ko: 그래서 너흰 뺏어가고도 나 몰라라 하는구나

translation.en: So, your mimom... is a very important humansperson to you.
translation.ko: 그럼 너의 '울 엄마'는 너한테 무척 중요하구나

translation.en: More important than others.
translation.ko: 누구보다 제일 소중한 '울 엄마'랑 떨어지면 슬픈 건데...

translation.en: To not belong with her causes you being sad.
But recent moments ago, you are kicking on me and yelling.
translation.ko: 넌 아까 나를 발로 차고 소리쳤어

translation.en: Which is seeming more to be mad than sad.
Well, sometimes it's both.
translation.ko: 때론 동시에 두 기분 다 느껴

translation.en: So, you are sad-mad.
Humans are more complicated than it said in the pamphlet.
I vacuumed here as fast as I could.
Whoa! What for is your plan for figuring out the dumb Boov's password?
I got nothing! (ALL MUTTERING)
Please, come on! I need ideas!
You! The purple one.
Oh, come on!
So?
translation.ko: 말해봐 숫자랑 글자랑 아무거나 누르면 어떨까요?

translation.en: We could type in random numbers and letters?
I like it! Get those big brains plugged in and working.
Away!
You know what the Gorg will do if they find us. Chomp, chomp, chomp.
translation.ko: 고그에게 들키면... 알지? 끝! 끝! 끝!

translation.en: OH: And that is why we keep running away.
translation.ko: 그래서 우린 계속 도망 다니는 거야

translation.en: Whoa.
Why do these Gorg hate you so much?
Because they are Gorg.
We calls Gorg the "takers"...
because if you has something, they takes it.
translation.ko: 네가 가진 건 뒤도 안 보고 뺏어가

translation.en: Like, if you has a sandwich.
Or a planet.
translation.ko: 샌드위치든 행성이든 알아들었어 지구를 넘보는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: No, no. I get it. But they're not coming to this planet, right?
Oh, no, no. Not to worry. The Big Brain Boov will to fix my mistake.
translation.ko: 걱정일랑 마 빅 브레인이 해결할 거야

translation.en: But I will still be very punished.
translation.ko: 그래도 난 중벌감이야 우린 룰이 있다요

translation.en: We has a rule.
translation.ko: 그래도 난 중벌감이야 우린 룰이 있다요 아홉 번 실수하면 끝, 아웃이야

translation.en: Nine mistakes and you are out.
How many mistakes do you have?
62. Hmm.
When I'm stressed out, my mom tells me jokes.
translation.ko: 기분이 꿀꿀할 땐 엄마랑 농담을 하곤 했지 부브는 농담 안 해

translation.en: Boov do not do telling jokes.
translation.ko: 부브는 농담 안 해 어렵지 않아 가르쳐 줄게, 똑, 똑!

translation.en: Oh, it's not that hard. I'll teach you. Knock, knock.
translation.ko: 어렵지 않아 가르쳐 줄게, 똑, 똑!

translation.en: You would say, "Who's there?"
You are there. No, just ask me.
Who is there? Now I say, "The interrupting cow."
Now you say, "The interrupting cow, who?"
Let's just do it. Knock, knock.
Who is there? The interrupting cow.
The interrupting cow-- Moo! (LAUGHS)
translation.ko: - 끼어드는 소... - 음메! 넌 끼어들어 내 말을 잘랐어

translation.en: You did not let me finish my response.
I was to say, "The interrupting co--" Moo!
You did it again.
That is the joke.
The cow is to being an interrupting cow...
and therefore interrupts me!
translation.ko: 소가 '끼어드는 소'니까 네가 끼어든 거구나! - 그니까 재밌잖니 - 음메!

translation.en: I know. That's why it's funny. Moo! (MEOWS)
Let me fi-- Moo!
translation.ko: - 내 말 끝나면... - 음메! - 그만! - 난 '끼어드는 소'

translation.en: That's enough. I'm the interrupting cow.
Knock it off! Moo!
Oh, don't make me get out more tape!
OH: So many Boovs!
I said this was dumbness.
I said I am doomed. But doos you listen? No!
translation.ko: 이건 멍청함이랬잖아, 망함이랬지 근데 넌 들었다요? 아뇨!

translation.en: Oh, that's enough! You are driving me to the crazy!
translation.ko: - 그만 좀 해 - 너 땜에 내가 미쳐

translation.en: It is never too late to run away. That is the Boov motto.
translation.ko: '아무리 늦게 도망쳐도 늦은 게 아냐', 우리 모토야

translation.en: Yes, but we're not doing that. I have a plan.
translation.ko: 나한테 맡겨 봐, 좋은 작전 있어

translation.en: Is your plan to run away? Because other-way-wise, it is stupid!
All we have to do is sneak into the city...
get into the Great Antenna, use it to find my mom...
translation.ko: 도시에 몰래 가서 위대한 안테나로 엄마를 찾고 몰래 나오는 거야 어때?

translation.en: and then sneak out again. See?
translation.ko: 엄마를 찾고 몰래 나오는 거야 어때? 개뿔! 내 얼굴 완전 유명하거든!

translation.en: But it still will not work because my face is known.
If I am seen by any Boov, I am 100% popular for being arrested.
(LAUGHS) What if I could fix that?
Hold still.
First, a little beauty mark.
Letting me see. Whoa!
Not yet. Give me that mirror. Give to me, give to me!
(EXCLAIMS) It is like looking at a completed stranger!
No, I'm not done. It's not even--
You are a worker of miraculous transformation!
Who is this Boov? I do not know! (SCREAMING JOYFULLY)
translation.ko: 이 부브 누구지? 누군지 나도 알랑가몰라!

translation.en: All right, Oh.
Owpain.
ELECTRONIC VOICE: Express elevator departing.
Whoa! This is uber freaky.
These are the smartest Boov you have?
translation.ko: 얘들이 제일 똑똑하다는 부브야? 최대한 조용히 해

translation.en: Shh! You must be very quiet.
You do not want to break their concentra-- (SCREAMS)
OH: Come party. Come party.
Oh! What is it?
I thought the Big Brain Boovs would have stopped my invitation by now.
translation.ko: 빅 브레인이 초대장을 삭제한 줄 알았어

translation.en: But they have still not figured out my password.
How is this possible? Wait a minute.
Does this mean those horrible monster Gorg thingies will come to Earth?
To Smekland, yes! And what happens then?
There will be no finding of Mimom!
(GASPS) Then you've gotta fix this!
Yes.
Hurry!
By to the way, is your skull flexible?
What? Never mind. It will be probably okay. Hold still.
Wow!
OH: (GASPS) 30 seconds to doom. I shall input my password. It is...
"My name is Oh and Captain Smek is great "and anyone who does not think that is a poomp 1."
translation.ko: '내 이름은 오, 스멕은 위대해 그걸 무시하면 누구든지 끝!'

translation.en: I wonder why no one guessed that.
I do not know.
It didn't work? Impossible! That is password!
That is-- Oh, no! Caps Lock.
Come on, come on, come on!
Come party. Come party. Come party. Come party.
Come party. Come party.
Yes!
Fa-da! It has worked. It worked! Oh!
You did it, Oh!
That was closeness.
Okay, on your feet.
translation.ko: 다리에 힘줘봐 이젠 우리 엄마 찾아줘

translation.en: You still have to find my mom.
translation.ko: 다리에 힘줘봐 이젠 우리 엄마 찾아줘 그건 간단이야 찾을 사람 이름이?

translation.en: Oh, that is simplicity. We shall now searching on...
Lucy Tucci. "Lucy Tucci."
Australia.
OH: Observe Mimom.
That's not funny. This is not your mimom?
Are you kidding? That's not her!
Sure? (GASPS)
I know, I know. Okay?
You've been saying that for two weeks.
Please!
translation.ko: 2주째 같은 말만 했잖아요 제발요! 눈은 커다랗고 초록색 피부는 아름답고 갈색

translation.en: She has big green eyes and beautiful brown skin.
translation.ko: 눈은 커다랗고 초록색 피부는 아름답고 갈색

translation.en: Mom.
So tell me where she is. Or find me a Boov who can.
translation.ko: 우리 딸이 어디 있는지 알려주든 아는 부브를 소개해주든

translation.en: Please.
Oh! Gratuity Tucci looks just like tiny Mimom.
Gratuity Tucci? Why for--
Thank you! Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you!
I can't believe it! My mom's in Australia!
And I has cancelled my e-vite!
I can finally come out of the hiding.
Yes!
Well, well, well.
Hello?
Hold my crown. And be very careful. It's the only one.
(CLEARS THROAT) Well, well, well. Did you really think you could escape?
translation.ko: 이런, 이런 도망칠 수 있다고 생각했나?

translation.en: Escape? No, no, no.
translation.ko: 도망이라뇨? 아니죠 그냥 드릴 말씀이 있어서...

translation.en: You see, I was just coming to tell you--
Despite your elaborate disguise...
translation.ko: 얼굴에 점을 콕 찍어 위장했지만 컴퓨터가 콕 알아봤지 넌 도망자 부브야

translation.en: the computer recognized you as... the fugitive Boov!
translation.ko: 컴퓨터가 콕 알아봤지 넌 도망자 부브야

translation.en: But he's a hero Boov now!
Yes! I has fixed my mistake!
Yes, but before that, you has made your mistake.
translation.ko: 처음부터 실수를 하지 말았어야지 그 실수 이전에도 넌 잘못이 많았어

translation.en: And many mistakes before that.
translation.ko: 그 실수 이전에도 넌 잘못이 많았어

translation.en: Wait, I have not-- Many, many, many, many!
Actually-- Many mistakes before that.
So, I still has to erase you. Why?
You cannot guarantee you would not make a mistake again.
But I would not. But you might.
But I would not. But you might.
But I would not.
We could go round and round. Let's do it again!
But I would not. But you might.
But I would not. I love this!
But I would not! Ah! Bored now.
But I would-- Shush!
TIP: Drop the bubble guns!
Or I will mess with this...
gravity thingy.
translation.ko: 중력 뭐시기! 살려고 뻥 치는 거야

translation.en: CAPTAIN SMEK: She is bluffing.
She could not possibly reach the gravity thingy.
translation.ko: 저 기럭지론 절대 닿을 수 없어

translation.en: (ALL GASP) (EXCLAIMS IN SURPRISE) Curse you and your tippy-toe tallness!
Huh! But no problem.
Boov technology is far too complicated for simple humansgirl to figure out.
translation.ko: 멍청한 인간소녀 따윈 우리 기술 풀지 못해

translation.en: Excuse me? (BOOV LAUGHING)
This humansgirl got an "A" in geometry.
She figured it out! Run for my life!
Out of my way! I am captain!
Grab on!
Oh, no! I can't hold you!
You weigh, like, a thousand pounds!
(LAUGHS) Let go.
What? Trust me.
Sorry. It is my duty to run away first.
translation.ko: 미안, 먼저 도망치는 건 내 의무야

translation.en: Poomp.
What are you waiting for? I cannot touch. It will not work if I drive it.
translation.ko: 난 안돼 내가 만지면 작동 안될 거야

translation.en: Fine. I'll drive. (YELPS)
Owpain.
You are terrible driver.
KYLE: Come on.
Come on. Come on.
Bon appetit. TIP: Oh, no, you don't!
I am not paying for that.
TIP: Come on, you stupid horse!
Whoo, that was cl--
This time I got you... and you cannot escape.
translation.ko: 이번에 붙잡히면 다신 도망 못 가

translation.en: ELECTRONIC VOICE: Fugitive Boov detected. I was wrong.
Jump!
TIP: Oh, no!
Look! I has found our car. TIP: Pig!
I do not know why for you brought that. We already hads food in the car.
translation.ko: 저건 왜 가져왔다요? 차에 먹을 거 많잖아

translation.en: It's not food, it's art.
Then it is bad. Stars do not look like that.
translation.ko: 참 못 그렸군 별은 저렇게 안 생겼다구

translation.en: It's not about how they look. It's about how they feel.
translation.ko: 중요한 건 보이는 게 아니라 어떻게 느끼느냐야

translation.en: They feel hot.
(CHUCKLES) Okay, math whiz, how long till we get to Australia?
And then, Gratuity Tucci... will see Mimom.
translation.ko: 마침내 티피 투치가 '울 엄마'와 만나는 거야

translation.en: You hear that, Pig? I can't wait to tell Mom I actually went to Paris...
translation.ko: 들었지, 피그? 만나면 파리에 갔던 얘기부터 할 거야

translation.en: which you know she always wanted to do.
translation.ko: 엄마가 무척 가보고 싶어 했거든 우리도 다시 오자 하늘을 나는 차가 생겼잖아

translation.en: Hey, maybe we could both come back here. We do have a flying car now.
translation.ko: 우리도 다시 오자 하늘을 나는 차가 생겼잖아

translation.en: How do you say "cat" in French?
(MEOWS) I think it's "chat."
Hmm. What is the purpose of your face?
I has confusion.
I do not wish to be erased.
But maybe Captain Smek is right.
translation.ko: 캡틴 스멕이 옳을지도 몰라 난 또 천방지축 실수할 게 뻔해

translation.en: It is possible I will continue making hilarious mistakes.
translation.ko: 난 또 천방지축 실수할 게 뻔해

translation.en: Probably.
That is not making me feel better.
Nobody's perfect.
My mom says your mistakes are what make you human. Hmm.
That is not what makes you Boov.
Gratuity Tucci...
before we came...
Captain Smek telled us that the humans needed us.
translation.ko: 캡틴 스멕은 지구에 오기 전에 인간에겐 부브가 필요하다고 했어 인간은 동물과도 같아서

translation.en: That the humans were just like the animals...
and that we could to make them better...
teach to them.
We were told the humans were simple and backwards.
It is what we thought.
But I am thinking now...
that we were thinking wrong.
And that Captain Smek is the wrongest.
I am thinking the Boov should never have come to Smekland.
To Earthland.
translation.ko: 이곳 지구에! 그래서 사과 주고 싶어, 티피 투치

translation.en: So I am saying the sorry to you... Gratuity Tucci.
translation.ko: 그래서 사과 주고 싶어, 티피 투치

translation.en: Call me Tip.
It was a new home, a new country.
translation.ko: 미국은 새로운 나라 새 보금자리 맞지만

translation.en: I tried to make friends at school...
but I was this nerd from Barbados.
translation.ko: 다른 나라에서 이민 온 왕따였던 거지

translation.en: But you dids to get an "A" in geometry.
Yeah, I did.
translation.ko: 그래, 그랬지! 다른 부브가 오! 라고 할 때마다

translation.en: OH: I know when the other Boovs said "Oh"...
translation.ko: 다른 부브가 오! 라고 할 때마다

translation.en: they were not happy to see me.
translation.ko: 내가 싫다는 뜻인 거 알고 있었어

translation.en: The true is, among Boov, I do not fit in.
I fit out.
She is so amazing.
She saved up everything she had...
so we could move and things would be better for us.
translation.ko: 덕분에 미국에 와서 많이 나아졌던 거야 나도 '울 엄마'를 빨리 보고 싶어

translation.en: OH: I cannot wait to meet Mimom.
(BOTH LAUGHING) "My name is Captain Smek. Shush, shush, shush."
"Boov technology is far too complicated "for simple humansgirl to figure out."
translation.ko: 멍청한 인간소녀 따윈 우리 기술 풀지 못해

translation.en: How did they find us? I do not know!
translation.ko: - 무슨 수로 우릴 찾아냈지? - 나도 몰라

translation.en: They're not attacking. Because they are running away.
translation.ko: - 잠깐, 우릴 공격 안 하네 - 도망가고 있기 때문이야

translation.en: Why are they running away? There can only be one reason.
Gorg.
This makes no sense. I stopped the message.
Gorg cannot to finding us. Then how did they?
translation.ko: - 찾을 방법이 없는데 - 그럼 어떻게 찾아냈지?

translation.en: There must be some other reason!
TIP: Oh, behind us! Engage weapons system.
We have a weapons system?
Go, Burrito Torpedo!
BOTH: Yes!
TIP: We've been hit! We're losing Grape Escape!
We lost Tangerine Twist!
If we lose Busta Lime, I cannot control!
translation.ko: 새콤달콤 라임을 잃으면 조종할 수 없어

translation.en: Click and ticket. We are to crash! Oh!
TIP: No, no, no. Slushious! No!
(TIP GRUNTS) Don't just stand there! Help!
Come on, come on, come on!
Slushious! No!
She's gone. We are doomed.
Now I'll never make it to Australia. I will now sing the Boov Death Song.
translation.ko: - 호주엔 못 갈꺼야 - 부브의 '굿바이 송' 부를 테야

translation.en: A Gorg ship!
It is rude to interrupt the Death Song.
Maybe you could take the parts from it to fix our car.
I cannot. Those are Gorg parts. They are metric.
translation.ko: 난 못해 고그 부품은 시스템이 달라

translation.en: We're not getting this close and giving up.
translation.ko: 거의 다 와놓고 포기할 순 없는 거야

translation.en: Come on. No!
Always with the running towards danger.
translation.ko: 넌 늘 위험을 향해 달려 남다른 부브가 돼봐 유일한 기회야

translation.en: Stop being such a Boov. It's our only chance. Come on.
This has low probability of success!
Let's go. Wait!
For what?
For you to change your mind.
(GROANS) Come on.
There's no pilot. It is just a drone.
That could have been badness. But we are not safety.
Gorg mothership will be here soon enough.
Can you use any of this?
Broken. Useless. Likely to cause thermonuclear fission.
What is it?
It is Gorg super-chip!
Why is it called a super-chip?
It is mostly marketing.
But it is key... for the Gorg are having machines
that are stronger and better at everything.
So we can never fight them with equaltude.
Can we use it to fix Slushious?
Yes, yes! The Slushious will fly again.
Yes! (CHUCKLES)
It was low probability of success.
Some Boov you are.
Quickly. We must fix the Slushious and find Mimom.
"My" mom. That is the thing I said.
I knew this would all work out!
TIP: You were awesome!
We're gonna find my mom... you're gonna show everybody the super-chip
and be a big hero... and even Captain Smek will have to--
translation.ko: 그럼 넌 영웅 될 거야 캡틴 스멕도 널...

translation.en: That's a lot of people.
Bye, Boov! MAN 2: Get lost!
Wow. You guys really are good at running away.
Yes. Yes, we are.
Look, over there! That's where we saw my mom!
Hurry up, it is the last ship!
It's okay, Pig. I'll be back with Mom.
We're almost there! OH: Over here.
What? Hurry!
I don't understand. She's in there?
Yes.
Tell me the truth. There is no time.
You can come with me. You will be safety.
My mom's not on that ship, is she?
You promised to help me find her, and you're leaving?
You lied to me. No! A lie is a bad thing.
translation.ko: - 넌 날 속였어 - 아냐! 거짓말은 나쁜 거

translation.en: I did a thing so you can live.
I'm not going. My mom is here.
translation.ko: 안 가, 엄마가 여기에 있단 말이야

translation.en: You will never find her. It is 100%.
Staying now does not make hope. Gorg mothership will be here soon.
translation.ko: 여기 남으면 희망은 없어 고그가 곧 들이닥쳐

translation.en: It destroys planets.
We must run away now! No!
It is true.
Humanspersons cannot even understand simple, simple things.
I am saving you! I am being your friend.
No, you're just running away. You don't leave your family.
translation.ko: 아냐, 넌 도망가는 거야 가족은 버리면 안돼

translation.en: But you can't understand that... because you're just a Boov!
You've never been my friend.
Wait! FEMALE ANNOUNCER ON SPEAKERS: Final escape pod departing.
I hate upon the Gorg! They are always finding us!
translation.ko: 난 고그를 증오해 우릴 어떻게든 찾아내

translation.en: The Gorg mothership!
CAPTAIN SMEK: We are doomed! Run away!
Make a path, I'm holding a baby.
It is the fugitive Boov!
(GASPS) He is running towards the danger!
Stop him!
Undo!
Captain, we are achieving new highest speeds!
What has you done? What is that thing?
translation.ko: 뭘 한 거야? 아까 그게 뭐였어?

translation.en: It is Gorg super-chip.
What?
Gorg drone crashed... and I ran to it
and I found the chip. CAPTAIN SMEK: Enough.
translation.ko: 추락한 고그 무인기로 달려가서 발견했다요 - 그만! - 고그에게 달려갔다고?

translation.en: You ran to a Gorg?
(GASPS) He runs towards the danger?
What kind of Boov is he?
He is like a Super Boov.
No, no, no.
He is not a Super Boov.
There is only one Super Boov on this ship, and you know who it is.
translation.ko: 슈퍼 부브는 한 명뿐이야 너희도 알잖아

translation.en: You're looking at him. I invented running away.
translation.ko: 눈앞에 있는 나뿐이야 도망 작전을 내가 세웠어

translation.en: And look at this. I have the Shusher.
translation.ko: 잘 봐 시끄봉도 내가 가지고 있잖아

translation.en: I am your captain. But you are not good captain.
What?
translation.ko: 뭐야? 우린 대장님 말은 뭐든 다 믿었어요

translation.en: You telled us these things, and we all believed them.
translation.ko: 우린 대장님 말은 뭐든 다 믿었어요

translation.en: I believed them.
But then I met a humansperson.
And she is not like you said.
(SCOFFS) She is brave and smart...
and cares about other humanspersons.
In a way that we Boov do not even care about each other.
translation.ko: 우리 부브는 서로에게 그렇게 안 하죠

translation.en: She even cares about me.
And I've done very little to earn that.
translation.ko: 난 별로 해준 게 없는데도 말이에요

translation.en: The Boov may be superior in many ways...
Uh-huh! Yeah.
...but not in the ways that I now thinks are most important.
Oh, big deal!
I have had enough. Shush!
That is enough shushing.
How dare you shush a shushing!
Oh is right. We need a new captain.
I thinks it should be Oh!
translation.ko: 난 오가 대장을 해야 한다고 봐

translation.en: Me? No.
No! He cannot be captain.
I have the Shusher. I am captain!
Not anymore!
He will not know how to operate it!
It is very complicated. Heavy on one end, light on the other.
Shush!
No, I am not a Leader Boov. I makes far too many mistakes.
translation.ko: 난 '리더 부브' 아냐 실수를 너무 많이 해

translation.en: You are not the only Boov who makes mistakes.
For examples... my mistake is not being your friend.
translation.ko: 날 봐 내 실수는 너랑 친구 안 한 거야

translation.en: All hail Captain Oh!
Ow! I saw who did that! I hold grudges, you know!
translation.ko: 난 똑똑히 봤어, 가만 안 둘 테다!

translation.en: BOOV: Oh, you're the best! Want me to host party, Oh?
translation.ko: 넌 최고야! 널 위해 파티 열까?

translation.en: Go away.
OH: No, you are supposed to be saying "Who is there?"
Then I am to be saying... (GASPS) Oh?
"Moo!" Oh!
I can't believe it!
But I saw your ship leave! (GROANS)
But you came back! What are you doing here?
It is where I belongs. You and Pigcat are my friends.
translation.ko: 여긴 내가 있을 곳이고 너랑 '피그냥이'는 내 친구야

translation.en: And alsos, too... I gave you a promise.
He's my friend.
Thank you.
Mom.
Oh, Tippy. My beautiful girl.
I've been looking everywhere, Mom.
translation.ko: 안 찾아 다닌 곳이 없어, 엄마!

translation.en: I was so scared we'd never see each other again.
translation.ko: 다신 못 볼까 봐 두려웠어 우주 끝까지 찾아갔을 거야

translation.en: Oh, Mom, I never would have stopped looking until I found you.
They are still looking.
Gorg are not the takers.
Boov are.
We must demonstrate our affections later. There is still one problem.
translation.ko: 포옹은 나중에 해요 문제가 하나 남았어요

translation.en: Excuse me, what is that?
That is Gorg mothership. It is here to destroy the planet.
It's going to destroy the planet?
Yes. But I haves a plan.
Oh?
What are you doing? I am sorry.
Tip cannot come into the out now.
translation.ko: 이제 팁은 이 밖으로 못 나와

translation.en: I am fixing my mistake.
translation.ko: 내 실수 꼭 고칠 테야 오! 너 혼자서는 할 수 없어

translation.en: Oh! You can't do this on your own!
translation.ko: 오! 너 혼자서는 할 수 없어

translation.en: Maybe not. But I haves hope.
translation.ko: 그럴지도 모르지 하지만 난 희망이 있어

translation.en: No! Stop, no! Please don't do this by yourself!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 멈춰! 제발 혼자 그러지 마

translation.en: No! Don't!
Oh!
Stop!
Look!
Hey!
Gorg!
Oh, it is useless to yell.
Gorg!
They're not gonna see him. It's not gonna work!
Merry Christmas.
Now? Just open it.
Thank you, sweetheart, but what--
What are you doing?
Distracting the driver.
(WHOOPS) It worked! The ship's stopping!
It's not gonna stop in time!
Stop faster!
He's gotta get out of there!
Mom, help me with this thing! (GRUNTING)
Oh! Run!
Tip! Stop! Tip!
Mom!
TIP: Oh!
You're alive.
But you scared me so bad!
You were scared? I almost made a number three.
translation.ko: 네가 무서워? 난 '3번' 할 뻔 했어

translation.en: Not too hard! It is still a possibility.
translation.ko: 너무 꽉 안지 마 '3번' 할 수도 있어

translation.en: TIP: What was all that?
Not all Gorg-speak has humans words.
translation.ko: 지구 언어로 다 옮겨지는 건 아냐 초대장을 받고 온 게 아닌 건 확실해

translation.en: But, it turns out, Gorg was not here because of my invitation...
translation.ko: 초대장을 받고 온 게 아닌 건 확실해

translation.en: though Gorg would have been happy to attend.
Gorg was here because Gorg was tracking the rock.
translation.ko: 스멕이 뺏어간 광석을 쫓고 있었던 거야

translation.en: What was in that thing? Gorg family.
It is entire next generation.
LUCY: All of them?
All of them.
No wonder they've been chasing you.
Not "they," "he."
Apparently, that Gorg is last Gorg.
That is why rock was so important.
Without it, he was alonely...
and would someday be extinctly...
which made Gorg cranky and irrational...
translation.ko: 그래서 까칠하게 변했어 그러다 결국 분노가 폭발한 거야

translation.en: and physically violent.
He was just like humansgirl.
He was sad-mad.
Thanking you.
Thanking you! High hand touching.
translation.ko: 쌩유! 하이 파이브! 쪼아, 하이 파이브!

translation.en: Yeah, give it here. High hand touching.
Up high! You are too slow.
High hand touching! That hurt.
Pig cat!
ALL: Hey, Oh!
Hello, friend Kyle.
I have that same color.
translation.ko: - 나도 똑같은 색깔 있어 - 안녕, '울 엄마'!

translation.en: Hi, Mimom. Hi, Oh.
translation.ko: - 나도 똑같은 색깔 있어 - 안녕, '울 엄마'! - 안녕! - 엄청난 파티야! 오!

translation.en: Awesome party, Oh!
Parties are so much more fun when other people show up.
Is it time to pick it up a level?
This is gonna be sweet!
Drop it like it has a high temperature!
Oh, no!
What is happening to my body?
(EXCLAIMING)
BOTH: Shake your Boov thang!
translation.ko: 엉덩이를 흔들어봐 내 손이 제멋대로 뱅뱅 돌아

translation.en: My hands are in the air like I just do not care!
OH: I has a new start in a new home with new friends.
translation.ko: 새 친구들과 새 집에서 새 삶을 시작한다요

translation.en: And now, every day is best day ever!
OH: You are all invited to a party, party, party.
Just head to the Milky Way. Turn right at the Big Dipper.
Third planet from the Sun. Look for my balloons!
translation.ko: 태양에서 세 번째 별이야 파티 풍선을 찾아

translation.en: Come party!
LUCY: Everybody, smile!
